content.text: Zucca is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with the Whitebeard Pirates.
He is a man with a werewolf-like appearance. He has brown hair, a shaggy brown beard and has fake beige ears. He is seen carrying a sword on his back.
Not much is known about Zucca's personality other than that he is very loyal to Whitebeard, as he was willing to risk his own life alongside the rest of the crew in order to save Ace from execution.

Zucca is a fearsome pirate, who has managed to achieve an infamous reputation in the New World. He has made an alliance with the Whitebeard Pirates. Zucca is a swordsman, as he is seen wielding a sword at Marineford. His exact level of swordsmanship is unknown, however it is presumed to be quite high.
Some time prior to the current storyline, Zucca became a known pirate in the New World, and allied himself with the Whitebeard Pirates.
When Portgas D. Ace was to be executed at Marineford, Zucca and his crew joined forces with the Whitebeard Pirates to save him.

The first apparition of Zucca is after Squard stabbed Whitebeard. He's seen with other pirates charging after Whitebeard destroyed icebergs. He is around Luffy and Ace few moments before Ace's death with other captains like Choi and Rush.
He is seen later when the Heart Pirates' submarine dives into the, along side of Baggaley, Palms, Andre, and Julius.
He, along with the rest of the crew, attended Whitebeard's and Ace's funeral on a undisclosed island somewhere in the New World.

"Zucca" means 'pumpkin' or 'squash' in Italian and is also the name of a commercial aperitif.
